titleStmt.title: The sirenes, or, Delight and judgment represented in a discourse concerning the great day of judgment and its power to damp and imbitter sensual delights, sports, and recreations / by Anthony Horneck ...
titleStmt.author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition corrected and enlarged.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Clark for Henry Mortlock ...,
